Student - Class in <Unnamed>
A class representing a Student's record, that is, the student's name, and detailed statistics regarding their grade.
v2.0 Changes
Default constructor added inputData(Scanner in) method added, for making it easier to enter grades. addScore(int score) method changed to addGrade(int grade). addGrade method only works with grades from 0 to 100. toString method include much more information than before. getAverage() method changed to getMean(). getSumOfSquares(), getVariance(), getStandardDeviation(). Different methods to get the number of quizzes earning a specific letter grade getTotalScore() was renamed to getTotalQuizScore(). getQuizCount() was renamed to getNumberOfQuizzes(). setName(String newName) method introduced. getScores() method introduced, so the scores entered are kept track of. All of these changes were backed up by a thorough testing procedure.
Student() - Constructor for class Student
Constructs an student with a name, with no quizzes taken.
Student(String) - Constructor for class Student
Constructs an student with a name, with no quizzes taken.
StudentTester - Class in <Unnamed>
Runs tests on different Student objects.
